Class ReportingAPIHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hds.aw.auto.reportingApi.sdk.ReportingAPIHttpClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthenticationV210, ReportingAPIClient

    public abstract class ReportingAPIHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class contains HTTP methods.

      • get

        public org.apache.http.HttpResponse get(java.lang.String uri,
                                        com.hds.auto.commons.util.http.RequestInformation requestInfo)
                                 throws ReportingAPISDKException
        Do a get against the given uri using the given RequestInformation
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to perform the get against
        requestInfo - The RequestInformation to use - will add any headers that are dependent on the lib
        Returns:
        Returns the Http Response for GET request. Returns null if we encounter an IOexception when trying to make the request and we expected it. If using this method to return null we should set raiseOnError to false first and causing handleError to swallow the exception.
        Throws:
        ReportingAPISDKException

      • put

        public org.apache.http.HttpResponse put(java.lang.String uri,
                                        org.apache.http.HttpEntity entity,
                                        com.hds.auto.commons.util.http.RequestInformation requestInfo)
                                 throws ReportingAPISDKException
        Do a put against the given uri using the given entity and request information
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to perform the put against
        entity - The entity to put
        requestInfo - The request information to use - will add any headers that are dependent on the lib
        Returns:
        Returns the Http Response for PUT request. Returns null if we encounter an IOexception when trying to make the request and we expected it. If using this method to return null we should set raiseOnError to false first and causing handleError to swallow the exception.
        Throws:
        ReportingAPISDKException

                                   throws ReportingAPISDKException
        Do a patch against the given uri, using the given entity and request information
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to perform the patch against
        entity - The entity to patch with
        requestInfo - The request information to use - we will add any headers that are dependent on the lib
        Returns:

        public <T> com.hds.auto.commons.util.http.ResponseObj<T> assembleResponseObject(org.apache.http.HttpResponse response,
                                                                                java.lang.reflect.Type type)
                                                                         throws ReportingAPISDKException
        Stores the information returned by the request into an object of type clazz and includes it in the ResponseObj.
        Parameters:
        response - The HttpResponse returned by issuing a request
        type - Class of the type of object that will be contained in the ResponseObj
        Returns:
        ResponseObj that contains response code, status, metrics and a clazz object
        Throws:
        ReportingAPISDKException

      • waitForCacheInvalidation

        public void waitForCacheInvalidation()
                              throws ReportingAPISDKException
        Waits a few seconds for the value to update on all nodes. This is necessary for certain actions because we cache the values. Pgq is asynchronous and so it takes 1-5 seconds for pgq to update and the cache to be invalidated. This affects properties that are cached such as user and client.
        Throws:
        ReportingAPISDKException
